HuggingFace.Note: Dynamic model fetching from HuggingFace API. Fallback to local database if API unavailable.

Models.Note: Currently using hardcoded model database in ModelDatabaseService.cs. Future versions will load from external JSON file.

Community.Note: Community features use sample data. Backend API integration planned for v2.0. User submissions saved locally only.

Updates.Note: Update checking via GitHub Releases API. Update repo URL before publishing.

Benchmark.Note: v1.0.3+ uses hardware spec-based scoring instead of synthetic benchmarks.

Privacy.Note: No telemetry collected. All data stays local.
